title: Installation issue: py-astropy
body:
Hi all,
Sorry to bother you, but I was wondering if any other Mac user had encountered a similar issue before.
I tried to install the package through the commands:
```console
spack install py-astropy
```
and
```console
spack install py-astropy ^wcslib
```
But got an error message during the build stage, due to missing (or not linked) header files.
Such as:
```bash
 >> 1229    astropy/wcs/include/astropy_wcs/util.h:21:10: fatal error: 'wcs.h' file not found
```
That can be seen in the output file: [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4131212/spack-build-out.txt).

Do you have any suggestions on how I can try to fix this issue or what I am doing wrong ?

Thank you

### Platform and user environment

Mac OS Catalina:
```commandline
Darwin LDianaAmorim-M30.dhcp.lbnl.us 19.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.2.0: Sat Nov  9 03:47:04 PST 2019; root:xnu-6153.61.1~20/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
OS version: 10.15.2
Clang version: 11.0.0 x86_64-apple-darwin19.2.0
spack git log: commit 7a0990903fbca221e044eb43edae6fd39dcca4eb
python version: Python 3.7.6 (installed and loaded via spack)
``` 

.spack/darwin/packages.yaml:
```cpp
packages:
  all:
    providers:
      mpi: [mpich, openmpi]
```
.spack/darwin/compilers.yaml:
```cpp
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: clang@11.0.0-apple
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/clang
      cxx: /usr/bin/clang++
      f77: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/gfortran
      fc: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/gfortran
    flags: {}
    operating_system: catalina
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    paths:
      cc: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/gcc
      cxx: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/g++
      f77: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/gfortran
      fc: /Users/LDianaAmorim/Documents/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/gcc-9.2.0-exw25ccpcwqlkcvuwn266kvwqzxbyelp/bin/gfortran
    flags: {}
    operating_system: catalina
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
```


### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status
```
led to the file:
[output.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4131230/output.txt)

Rebuilding the package with the following options:
```console
$ spack -d install -j 1 <spec>
```
led to the files:

[spack-cc-py-astropy-6ggjsuu.in.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4131235/spack-cc-py-astropy-6ggjsuu.in.log)
[spack-cc-py-astropy-6ggjsuu.out.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4131236/spack-cc-py-astropy-6ggjsuu.out.log)
